Others: Sri Lanka announces a 16-member squad for the upcoming three-match ODI series against West Indies.
Chamindu Wickramasinghe earns his maiden ODI call-up.
Wanindu Hasaranga and Dilshan Madushanka return from injuries.
Sri Lanka enters the ODI series after a 2-1 T20I series win over West Indies.
The series begins on October 20, followed by the second and third ODIs on October 23 and 26, respectively.
The ODI series will take place at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium.
